creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red and black; bands of red, white, black silk-like fabric sewn together with machine stitching; black cut-work; floral embroidery with yellow metal outlining, 3 red and purple satin-stitched petals one set on white and the other set on blue; wide black twill band at each end of sash; main section lined in pink checked fabric; machine stitched
title: Headband (or Sash?)
